homepage.title: ISR Members Directory
homepage.subtitle: Complete directory of Indonesian Society of Respirology members for easy access to professional information across Indonesia.
homepage.searchPlaceholder: Search name, NPA, hospital, city, province, or branch...
homepage.howToUseSubtitle: Follow simple steps to find the member information you need
homepage.howToUseStep1Desc: Enter name, NPA, hospital name, or location in the search field to find members
homepage.howToUseStep2Desc: Use province, branch, or other filters to narrow down your search results
homepage.howToUseStep3Desc: Click on any member to view complete information in detail
homepage.dataSourceDesc: This member data is managed by the Central Board of PDPI and updated regularly. For more information or data corrections, please contact the PDPI secretariat.

howToUse.subtitle: Quick guide to using the ISR members directory
